cause.description:
This association is dedicated to helping people with lung disease. We raise money to benefit research and educational programs created to help those suffering from such diseases.
1. ALAU is dedicated to helping people, but honestly, that takes money... Help with fundraising!
2. Research is needed to find cures for lung disease.
3. Education about these diseases provide individuals with the tools necessary to manage these problems.
cause.name: American Lung Association of Utah
